short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight to search, allows search on multiple websites. I plan to make this available to search a user entered website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple highlight to search extension that allows a user to highlight a piece of text on the browser and search it on a website. Currently the list of websites available to search are as follows;
Google
YouTube
Reddit
Dailymotion
StackOverflow
